sense.name: Make ineffective by counterbalancing the effect of.
sense.examples: This one action negates all of my months of toil. Her optimism negates his gloom. The company said that improved results were negated by increased costs.

sense.name: Deny the truth of, possibly by showing to be false.
sense.commentary: Syntax Includes: NP1[agent] NEGATE NP2[proposition] NP1[proposition] NEGATES NP2[proposition] NP1[agent] NEGATE NP2[patient]
sense.examples: By this, he negates the existence of God. His argument negates the claim that all creatures are inherently kind. You can't just negate 300 years of research by wishing it away!
